replies.msg:
https://leetcode.com/problems/two-sum
def two_sum(nums, target)
  hash = {}
  nums.each_with_index do |num, i|
    return [hash[target - num], i] if hash.has_key?(target - num)

    hash[num] = i
  end
end

https://leetcode.com/problems/add-two-numbers
def add_two_numbers(l1, l2)
  head = nil
  output = nil
  carry = 0
  sum = 0
  
  loop do
    sum = (l1&.val || 0) + (l2&.val || 0) + carry
    
    next_node = ListNode.new(sum % 10)

    if output
      output = output.next = next_node
    else
      head = output = next_node
    end
    
    carry = (sum / 10).floor
    
    break unless l1&.next || l2&.next

    l1 = l1&.next
    l2 = l2&.next
  end
  
  output.next = ListNode.new(carry) if carry.positive?
  
  head
end
際遇差，所以用地球最慢嘅 language 寫

https://leetcode.com/problems/longest-substring-without-repeating-characters
def length_of_longest_substring(s)
  ans = start = 0
  hash = {}
  
  s.split('').each_with_index do |char, index|
    start = [hash[char], start].max if hash.has_key? char
    ans = [ans, index - start + 1].max
    hash[char] = index + 1
  end
  
  ans
end

https://leetcode.com/problems/median-of-two-sorted-arrays/

人廢諗唔到，𠵱題 hack 咗佢

def find_median_sorted_arrays(nums1, nums2)
  merged_arr = nums1.concat(nums2).sort
  
  (merged_arr[(merged_arr.length - 1) / 2] + merged_arr[merged_arr.length / 2]) / 2.0
end
lm

quote.msg:
https://leetcode.com/problems/median-of-two-sorted-arrays/

人廢諗唔到，𠵱題 hack 咗佢

def find_median_sorted_arrays(nums1, nums2)
  merged_arr = nums1.concat(nums2).sort
  
  (merged_arr[(merged_arr.length - 1) / 2] + merged_arr[merged_arr.length / 2]) / 2.0
end

replies.msg:
依題睇最快解法係binary search嚟
當時做真係睇咗好耐先明
O(log N)個idea主要就係

你搵median 就有分前半段同後半段array
依array A同B咁啱就有個關係
就係length of A前半段+B前半段
理論上就係等於A後半段+B後半段
單雙數會有一個element出入啦

換言之 你知道A前半嘅length 就等於知道咗:

1. A後半段嘅length
2. B前半段嘅length
3. B後半段嘅length

即係你已經知哂所有嘢

咁依家只係要做一樣嘢 就係對A前半段嘅length做binary search
每個case只需要compare array切口果4個value
就知自己啱唔啱

大約係咁 好難完全講明哂 寫咗次學咗個idea幾好

replies.msg: 都係唔太明，study 吓先，當然我知 binary search 係乜嚟啦

quote.msg:
https://leetcode.com/problems/median-of-two-sorted-arrays/

人廢諗唔到，𠵱題 hack 咗佢

def find_median_sorted_arrays(nums1, nums2)
  merged_arr = nums1.concat(nums2).sort
  
  (merged_arr[(merged_arr.length - 1) / 2] + merged_arr[merged_arr.length / 2]) / 2.0
end

依題睇最快解法係binary search嚟
當時做真係睇咗好耐先明
O(log N)個idea主要就係

你搵median 就有分前半段同後半段array
依array A同B咁啱就有個關係
就係length of A前半段+B前半段
理論上就係等於A後半段+B後半段
單雙數會有一個element出入啦

換言之 你知道A前半嘅length 就等於知道咗:

1. A後半段嘅length
2. B前半段嘅length
3. B後半段嘅length

即係你已經知哂所有嘢

咁依家只係要做一樣嘢 就係對A前半段嘅length做binary search
每個case只需要compare array切口果4個value
就知自己啱唔啱
